name: Monster Girl Month 2021 - Mermaid (day 1)
description:
A little game made for OmegaSlant's Monster Girl Month.

Day 1 - Mermaid

Catch the bubbles released by the mermaid.

Controls

Z / C / X / V: swim up

Down arrow: swim down

Left / down arrow: move
